articles.title: NASCAR settles federal antitrust case filed by 2 of its teams, one owned by NBA great Michael Jordan
articles.description: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — A federal antitrust case accusing NASCAR of being a monopolistic bully was settled Thursday after the stock car racing series agreed to make the charters at the heart of its business model permanent for its teams.
